entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cap Chat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
